      • reverseScale

        protected double reverseScale(double scale)
        Finds the complement of the scaling factor. This is abstract out in case we ever need other-than-linear scaling.
        Parameters:
        scale - - scaling factor
        Returns:
        the complement of the scaling factor

      • invalidate

        public void invalidate(IDrawable drawable)
        Description copied from interface: IView
        This method invalidates a given element. Calling this method tells the view to reload the texture for a given element, then re-render the display
        Parameters:
        drawable - This is the element which is no longer valid. Reload this element's image and re-render it to the display
        See Also:
        IView.invalidate(votebox.middle.view.IDrawable)

      • run

        public void run(java.lang.Runnable lambda)
        Description copied from interface: IView
        This method initializes and launches the view, putting the view into its event loop. Before the loop starts, and after the initialization, a given lambda is executed.
        Parameters:
        lambda - Run this lambda before the loop.
        See Also:
        IView.run(java.lang.Runnable)
